class_description:
An era in the Minguo calendar system. The Minguo calendar system has two eras.
 The current era, for years from 1 onwards, is known as the 'Republic of China' era.
 All previous years, zero or earlier in the proleptic count or one and greater
 in the year-of-era count, are part of the 'Before Republic of China' era. Do not use ordinal() to obtain the numeric representation of MinguoEra.
 Use getValue() instead.
